body: Others are often dumfounded by your luck.
name: Inexplicable Luck
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Humans/New Racial Rules/Human Feats/Inexplicable Luck

sections.body: Once per day, as a free action before a roll is made, you gain a +8 bonus on any single d20 roll. You can also use this ability after the roll is made, but if you do, this bonus is reduced to +4.
sections.name: Benefit
